attributes.action: Introduce a legal definition of "a religion" for the purposes of state funding and other legislation.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
State funding (eg for faith schools), anti-blasphemy laws, charitable status, etc are provided for various religious groups. 

Could we have a legal definition of what constitutes a religion to ensure that they are all treated equally? This may, or may not, include the following: number of adherents, moral stance, benefit to society, etc.

The definition should not name any faith specifically but should be a set of requirements for any religion to fulfill in order to be recognized by the state.
